mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into user (account, `password`, email, `status`, create_time, last_login_time, last_login_ip, login_count) values (#{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{createTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lastLoginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginCount,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update user set account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=CHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, last_login_ip = #{lastLoginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_count = #{loginCount,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, account, `password`, email, `status`, create_time, last_login_time, last_login_ip, login_count from user where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, account, `password`, email, `status`, create_time, last_login_time, last_login_ip, login_count from user
